content.query:
CREATE TABLE FactSales
(
    SaleID INT,
    SalesDate INT,
    CustomerID INT,
    EmployeeID INT,
    StoreID INT,
    ProductID INT,
    NoOfUnits INT,
    SaleAmount INT,
    SalesReasonID INT,
    ProductCost INT
);
GO

COPY INTO FactSales
FROM 'https://ramdlsv50.blob.core.windows.net/ramdlsfsv50/simplemodel/FactSales.csv'
WITH (
    FILE_TYPE = 'CSV',
    CREDENTIAL = (
        IDENTITY = 'Shared Access Signature',
        SECRET = '?sv=2021-06-08&st=2022-06-30T09%3A21%3A00Z&se=2022-07-02T09%3A21%3A44Z&sr=b&sp=r&sig=G1oARhWyUvAEJ3y%2FY5YryqOIdss%2B7ekZUPmLxUP7pNk%3D'
    ),
    FIELDQUOTE = '"',
    FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
    ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0A',
    ENCODING = 'UTF8',
    FIRSTROW = 2
);
GO

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FactSales;

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FactSales
    OPTION (LABEL = 'Result Set Caching Test')

SELECT request_id, status, submit_time, total_elapsed_time, [label], command, result_cache_hit
FROM sys.dm_pdw_exec_requests
WHERE [label] = 'Result Set Caching Test'
ORDER BY submit_time DESC

ALTER DATABASE SQLPool001
SET RESULT_SET_CACHING ON;

SELECT name, is_result_set_caching_on 
FROM sys.databases;
